# Military Disability Nexus
> Clinician-led medical documentation services (Nexus Letters & DBQs) for VA disability claims.

## Core Pages
- [/](/): Claim readiness diagnostic and quick intake.
- [/services](/services): Index of medical documentation and coaching services.
- [/case-studies](/case-studies): Real-world examples of successful medical evidence rationale.
- [/community](/community): Q&A database for VA disability and claims questions.
- [/blog](/blog): Educational resources on PACT Act, secondary conditions, and VA ratings.
- [/about](/about): Mission, clinician expertise, and process overview.
- [/contact](/contact): Free consultation booking and records review inquiry.

## Service Categories
- **Nexus Letters**: Independent Medical Opinions (IMO) for service connection.
- **DBQs**: Disability Benefits Questionnaires for claim evaluations.
- **Pension Benefits**: Aid & Attendance and Housebound evaluations.
- **Claim Strategy**: Secondary conditions, PACT Act reviews, and 1151 claims.

## Contact
- Web: [Contact Form](/contact)
- Email: contact@militarydisabilitynexus.com
- Phone: +1-307-301-2019
